title: Shooting in Jefferson Parish leaves woman wounded: JPSO
content:
The Jefferson Parish Sheriff's Office is investigating a shooting reported just before midnight on New Year's Eve, according to an alert issued at 11:38 p.m. Initial reports indicated a woman suffered injuries that were not life-threatening.
Sheriff's office officials said the woman accidentally shot herself and then drove to West Jefferson Medical Center, 1101 Medical Center Blvd. in Marrero, for treatment.
No additional information was immediately available from authorities.
UPDATE: An earlier version of this story, based on initial information, said it was not clear whether the shooting took place at West Jefferson Medical Center. The story was updated Sunday morning to reflect that the woman accidentally shot herself and then drove to the hospital for treatment.
The shooting happened in the 3000 block of Gentilly Boulevard, New Orleans police said.
